name: Leo, Pope of Rome
troparia: (Tone 8) Champion of orthodoxy, teacher of purity and of true worship,* the enlightener of the universe and the adornment of the hierarchs:* All-wise Father Leo, your teachings have gleamed with light upon all things.* Intercede before Christ our God to save our souls!
kontakia: (Tone 3) You sat on the throne of priesthood, O glorious one,* and shut the mouths of metaphorical lions,* with God-inspired dogmas of the Honorable Trinity you shone the radiance of understanding of God on your herd.* Therefore you are glorified as a divine initiate of God's grace.
